    __construct()
  • Adds a CSS Link to the template output.
    addCss()
  • Assigns an array of key/value pairs to an XMLForm. Use to apply custom default values to a form.
    addItem()

    addJs()
  • Generates an HTML List from an XML Dom Tree using Styroform LISTELEMENT and LIST nodes. (See Styroform XSL for specific format)
    addList()

    addNodeList()
  • Add a credential to the Symfony User
    addcredential()
  • Merges an array value to the widget_var array. The "array" must conform to name/value format, but the value of the array can be any valid php object, string, number, array, etc...
    assignWidgetVar()
  • Adds an IP Address to the Blocked Sites Directory, via SecurityPageWidget
    blockIP()
  • Transforms a WTVRData XML Schema to a WTVRData Recordset. Generally better to use dataMap, but this does expose some internals of the WTVR Data class.
    buildResult()
  • Gets the value of a COOKIE variable, returning the default if nothing is found.
    cookieVar()
  • Create an Excel Spreadsheet as a Binary Stream from a PDO Result Set. The "Args" param should include the filename, and the location.
    createExcel()
  • Create a Styroform List as an HTML Element from a PDO Result Set.
    createList()
  • Transforms a WTVRData XML Schema to a data object, of type "output_type", either an Array or XML.
    dataMap()
  • Used to export date-specific data from tables.
    dbBackup()
  • Return original filename from Windows Safe Filename
    decodeFilename()
  • Character Delimited Data List Generator, creates a Character Delimited String from a specific array.
    delimList()
  • Creates HTML from passed Widget Variables
    drawWidget()
  • Removes specific characters from a filename to make it Windows Safe.
    encodeFilename()
  • Executes each widget class, determines if AB Testing should occur, and assigns widget vars to the variables array.
    execWidget()
  • Parses Widget Classes, Renders Widget Templates, and returns content
    execute()

    parseFormFragment()

    parseWidgets()

    postVar()

    processVar()

    propelArgs()
  • Utility function for propel queries, without arguments.
    propelInsert()
  • Utility function for propel queries, without arguments.
    propelQuery()
  • Assigns a WTVRData Item Array to the currently active XMLForm, using the currently active Crud Object. The Crud will be populated with the optional $id parameter. Note both the XMLForm and Crud are generated with any PageWidget by default.
    pushItem()
  • Causes a browser redirect header to be written to the browser using symfony.
    redirect()
  • Causes a browser redirect header with associated javascript redirect to be written to the browser.
    redirectHeaders()

    removecookieVar()

    renderWidgets()

    returnArray()

    returnDelim()

    returnDojoJson()
  • Returns an Excel Binary Stream from a WTVR Data Query.
    returnExcel()
  • Takes an XMLForm and returns HTML using the appropriate form arrays for values, defaults, etc...
    returnForm()
  • Return an Styroform Form and a Styroform List as separate elements of an array.
    returnFormAndList()
  • Returns an XMLForm snippet as an html fragment, great for parsing subsections of a form via AJAX.
    returnFragment()
  • Returns a json object from a WTVR Data Query.
    returnJson()
  • Return a Styroform List as an HTML Element.
    returnList()

    returnListAndForm()
  • Generates a PDF from a specific array.
    returnPDF()
  • Returns the value of a variable, using SESSION.
    sessionVar()
  • Set the Symfony User as authenticated.
    setAuthenticated()
  • Sets a Header Property for the Current Page
    setHeader()
  • Assigns the Symfony Layout to the current page's output. Default for all pages would come from the YML Page Template, but this would be modified to be "/app/application/templates/".$name.".php".
    setLayout()
  • Sets a Meta Property for the Current Page
    setMeta()
  • Add a Header to a PDF
    setPDFHeader()
  • Sets the value of an sfConfig variable.
    setProcessVar()
  • Sets the HTTP Status Property for the Current Page
    setStatus()
  • Assigns the HTML Template to the current widget's output. Default for all widgets is the widget name, ".template.php", but this would be modified to be $name.".template.php".
    setTemplate()
  • Sets the Title of the Current Page
    setTitle()
  • Adds a name/value pair to the widget_var array. The actual value can be any valid php object, string, number, array, etc...
    setWidgetVar()
  • Sets the value of a COOKIE variable.
    setcookieVar()
  • Sets the value of a FLASH variable.
    setflashVar()
  • Sets the value of a GET variable.
    setgetVar()
  • Sets the value of a POST variable.
    setpostVar()
  • Sets the value of a SESSION variable.
    setsessionVar()
  • Construct a datetime element from Styroform Composite Form Elements
    sfDateTime()
  • Export the "showData" setting for debugging WTVR Data.
    showData()
  • Display a file from a path using a filename. Better to use the ImageHelper unless using an unusual mime type.
    showFile()
  • Export the "showXML" setting for debugging Styroform and WTVR Data.
    showXML()
  • Removes an IP Address from the Blocked Sites Directory, via SecurityPageWidget
    unblockIP()
  • Returns the location of a User Specific directory.
    userDir()
  • XML Data List Generator, creates an XML Tree from a specific array.
    xmlList()

  • Loads a Page YML File
    loadYml()
  •  Properties
  • Register used in AB Testing
    $abcommit
  • Cache length of a particular page
    $cachetime
  • Inbound Symfony Context
    $context
  • Container for WTVR Data Object
    $dataObj
  • Registers errors from the widget parsing, and returns to symfony as "error"
    $error
  • Widgets can override any parsing of any other widgets, and "force" a specific content result to be displayed. Good for errors.
    $forced_content
  • Buffer for storing Forced Content results
    $forced_output
  • Symfony layout to be used in rendering the page
    $layout
  • The operation parsed from the url /$action/$op
    $op
  • Content returned from parsed widgets, returned to symfony as "content"
    $result
  • Register to serialize variables coming from widgits with identical names
    $varcount
  • Register for storing widget vars passed from each widget
    $variables
  • » Private
  • Name of the widget being accessed
    $module
  • Name of the page being accessed
    $name
  • Page object parsed from Page YML
    $page
  • sfRequest Object Passed from Symfony
    $request
  • Name of PageWidget Template used to render widgets
    $template

Parses Widgets from YML and outputs HTML to Default Symfony Module Note, this class is embedded into the lib/symfony/filter/sfRenderingFilter.class.php Line 53 - 56

Assigns a WTVRData Item Array to the currently active XMLForm, using the currently active Crud Object. The Crud will be populated with the optional $id parameter. Note both the XMLForm and Crud are generated with any PageWidget by default.

XML Data List Generator, creates an XML Tree from a specific array.

xmlList(array $data, string $type, string $ret, string $base) : mixed
Inherited

Type refers to the method in which a list is rendered in HTML, as CSS Divs or as a table with tr/td tags.

A "standard" ret results in an HTML List element, a "return" ret will return the modified array, and the default is to add the list to the current XML Tree, if using Styroform. Base refers to the base nodeelement in a Styroform XML Tree that the list would be appended to.

name xmlList
inherited_from \Utils_PageWidget::xmlList()

Parameters

$data

array

$type

string
  • "css,table"

$ret

string
  • "standard,return"

$base

string

Returns

mixed
